actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to establish a Presidential Advisory Panel for Coordination of Government Debt Collection and Delinquency Prevention Activities.
short_title: Presidential Advisory Panel for Coordination of Government Debt Collection and Delinquency Prevention Activities Act

summary.text: Presidential Advisory Panel for Coordination of Government Debt Collection and Delinquency Prevention Activities Act - Establishes a Presidential Advisory Panel for Coordination of Government Debt Collection and Delinquency Prevention Activities to: (1) evaluate Federal policies on debt collection and delinquency prevention; (2) develop and recommend new policies and procedures; and (3) establish training manuals to increase the efficiency of employees involved in collection activities. Directs the Panel to submit a final report to the President and each House of Congress within 18 months after its first meeting. Terminates the Panel 30 days after submission of such report. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Presidential Advisory Panel for Coordination of Government Debt Collection and Delinquency Prevention Activities Act
A bill to establish a Presidential Advisory Panel for Coordination of Government Debt Collection and Delinquency Prevention Activities.
